text:
Is Johnny Depp really quitting his all-star rock band, Hollywood Vampires ? That’s the claim in one of the new tabloids, but Gossip Cop has learned the truth. The actor formed his rock supergroup in 2015 along with Alice Cooper and Joe Perry , but an article in the latest issue of Star says he’s now ready […]
